Ingredients.1: 10 large  ripe peaches - peeled, pitted, and chopped

Ingredients.12: 0.5 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Combine peaches, sugar, vanilla extract, bourbon, cornstarch, and cinnamon together in a bowl. Fruit filling will be fairly soupy. Divide filling into 8 oven-safe ramekins and place on a baking sheet.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven, uncovered, for 35 to 40 minutes, carefully stirring every 15 minutes.

Directions.4: Meanwhile, mix flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl and set aside. Beat sugar and butter with an electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Beat in egg and vanilla until smooth. Stir in dry ingredients until just combined. Crumble topping evenly over hot filling.

Directions.5: Return to the oven and bake until topping has spread and is nicely browned and fruit is bubbly, about 15 minutes.
